(2010) | Next album = }} '''Dark Diary''' is the fifth full-length studio album release by the [[Romania]]n [[Power metal]] band [[Magica (band)|Magica]]. ==Track listing== # Anywhere But Home 4:22 # Tonight 03:32 # Never Like You 03:59 # Wait For Me 04:18 # Need 04:00 # Release My Demons 04:08 # On the Side of Evil 04:21 # My Kin My Enemy 04:05 # Used to be an Angel 03:34 # We are Horde 04:21 # Dear Diary 01:52 # Victory (Bonus Track) 4:31 ==Credits== *Ana Mladinovici - Vocalshttp://www.metal-archives.com/release.php?id=267374 *Bogdan Costea - Guitar *Sorin Vlad - Bass *6Fingers - Keyboards *Hertz - Drums ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:2010 albums]] [[Category:Magica albums]] [[Category:AFM Records albums]] [[sco:Dark Diary]]
